title: CdnManagementClient
description: Use these APIs to manage Azure CDN resources through the Azure Resource Manager. You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.

type.description: The type of the resource whose name is to be validated.

CheckNameAvailabilityOutput.description: Output of check name availability API.

message.description: The detailed error message describing why the name is not available.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the name is available.

reason.description: The reason why the name is not available.

CustomDomain.description: Customer provided domain for branding purposes, e.g. www.consoto.com.

CustomDomainListResult.description: Result of the request to list custom domains. It contains a list of custom domain objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of custom domain objects if there are any.

value.description: List of CDN CustomDomains within an endpoint.

CustomDomainParameters.description: The customDomain JSON object required for custom domain creation or update.

CustomDomainProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the custom domain to create.

customHttpsProvisioningState.description: Provisioning state of Custom Https of the custom domain.

hostName.description: The host name of the custom domain. Must be a domain name.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning status of the custom domain.

resourceState.description: Resource status of the custom domain.

validationData.description: Special validation or data may be required when delivering CDN to some regions due to local compliance reasons. E.g. ICP license number of a custom domain is required to deliver content in China.

CustomDomainPropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the custom domain to create.

hostName.description: The host name of the custom domain. Must be a domain name.

DeepCreatedOrigin.description: Origin to be added when creating a CDN endpoint.

DeepCreatedOriginProperties.description: Properties of origin Properties of the origin created on the CDN endpoint.

hostName.description: The address of the origin. It can be a domain names, IPv4 address, or IPv6 address.

httpPort.description: The value of the HTTP port. Must be between 1 and 65535

httpsPort.description: The value of the HTTPS port. Must be between 1 and 65535

EdgeNodeProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties required to create an edgenode.

EdgenodeResult.description: Result of the request to list CDN edgenodes. It contains a list of ip address group and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of edgenode list results if there are any.

Endpoint.description: CDN endpoint is the entity within a CDN profile containing configuration information such as origin, protocol, content caching and delivery behavior. The CDN endpoint uses the URL format <endpointname>.azureedge.net.

EndpointListResult.description: Result of the request to list endpoints. It contains a list of endpoint objects and a URL link to get the the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of endpoint objects if there are any.

value.description: List of CDN endpoints within a profile

EndpointProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties required to create an endpoint.

hostName.description: The host name of the endpoint structured as {endpointName}.{DNSZone}, e.g. consoto.azureedge.net

origins.description: The source of the content being delivered via CDN.

EndpointPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: Result of the request to list endpoints. It contains a list of endpoints and a URL link to get the next set of results.

contentTypesToCompress.description: List of content types on which compression applies. The value should be a valid MIME type.

geoFilters.description: List of rules defining user geo access within a CDN endpoint. Each geo filter defines an acess rule to a specified path or content, e.g. block APAC for path /pictures/

isCompressionEnabled.description: Indicates whether content compression is enabled on CDN. Default value is false. If compression is enabled, content will be served as compressed if user requests for a compressed version. Content won't be compressed on CDN when requested content is smaller than 1 byte or larger than 1 MB.

isHttpAllowed.description: Indicates whether HTTP traffic is allowed on the endpoint. Default value is true. At least one protocol (HTTP or HTTPS) must be allowed.

isHttpsAllowed.description: Indicates whether HTTPS traffic is allowed on the endpoint. Default value is true. At least one protocol (HTTP or HTTPS) must be allowed.

optimizationType.description: Customer can specify what scenario they want this CDN endpoint to optimize, e.g. Download, Media services. With this information we can apply scenario driven optimization.

originHostHeader.description: The host header CDN sends along with content requests to origin. The default value is the host name of the origin.

originPath.description: The path used when CDN sends request to origin.

queryStringCachingBehavior.description: Defines the query string caching behavior

EndpointUpdateParameters.description: Properties required to create a new endpoint.

ErrorResponse.description: Error reponse indicates CDN service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

GeoFilter.description: Rules defining user geo access within a CDN endpoint.

action.description: Action of the geo filter, i.e. allow or block access.

countryCodes.description: Two letter country codes defining user country access in a geo filter, e.g. AU, MX, US.

relativePath.description: Relative path applicable to geo filter. (e.g. '/mypictures', '/mypicture/kitty.jpg', and etc.)

deliveryRegion.description: The delivery region of the ip address group

ipv4Addresses.description: The list of ip v4 addresses.

ipv6Addresses.description: The list of ip v6 addresses.

contentPaths.description: The path to the content to be loaded. Path should be a relative file URL of the origin.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list CDN operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of CDN operations supported by the CDN resource provider.

Origin.description: CDN origin is the source of the content being delivered via CDN. When the edge nodes represented by an endpoint do not have the requested content cached, they attempt to fetch it from one or more of the configured origins.

OriginListResult.description: Result of the request to list origins. It contains a list of origin objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of origin objects if there are any.

value.description: List of CDN origins within an endpoint

OriginProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin to create.

hostName.description: The address of the origin. Domain names, IPv4 addresses, and IPv6 addresses are supported.

httpPort.description: The value of the HTTP port. Must be between 1 and 65535.

httpsPort.description: The value of the https port. Must be between 1 and 65535.

OriginPropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin to create.

hostName.description: The address of the origin. Domain names, IPv4 addresses, and IPv6 addresses are supported.

httpPort.description: The value of the HTTP port. Must be between 1 and 65535.

httpsPort.description: The value of the HTTPS port. Must be between 1 and 65535.

OriginUpdateParameters.description: Origin properties needed for origin creation or update.

Profile.description: CDN profile represents the top level resource and the entry point into the CDN API. This allows users to set up a logical grouping of endpoints in addition to creating shared configuration settings and selecting pricing tiers and providers.

sku.description: The pricing tier (defines a CDN provider, feature list and rate) of the CDN profile.

ProfileListResult.description: Result of the request to list profiles. It contains a list of profile objects and a URL link to get the the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of profile objects if there are any.

value.description: List of CDN profiles within a resource group.

ProfileProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties required to create a profile.

ProfileUpdateParameters.description: Properties required to update a profile.

contentPaths.description: The path to the content to be purged. Can describe a file path or a wild card directory.

QueryStringCachingBehavior.description: Defines the query string caching behavior.

ResourceType.description: Type of CDN resource used in CheckNameAvailability.

ResourceUsage.description: Output of check resource usage API.

currentValue.description: Actual value of the resource type.

unit.description: Unit of the usage. e.g. Count.

ResourceUsageListResult.description: Output of check resource usage API.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of custom domain objects if there are any.

Sku.description: The pricing tier (defines a CDN provider, feature list and rate) of the CDN profile.

SsoUri.description: SSO URI required to login to the supplemental portal.

ssoUriValue.description: The URI used to login to the supplemental portal.

ValidateCustomDomainInput.description: Input of the custom domain to be validated for DNS mapping.

hostName.description: The host name of the custom domain. Must be a domain name.

customDomainValidated.description: Indicates whether the custom domain is validated or not.

message.description: Error message describing why the custom domain is not valid.

reason.description: The reason why the custom domain is not valid.

prefixLength.description: The length of the prefix of the ip address.

actions.title: CheckNameAvailability
actions.description: Check the availability of a resource name. This is needed for resources where name is globally unique, such as a CDN endpoint.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: EdgeNodes_List
actions.description: Lists all the edge nodes of a CDN service.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: ListOperations
actions.description: Lists all of the available CDN REST API operations.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: ListResourceUsage
actions.description: Check the quota and actual usage of the CDN profiles under the given subscription.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: Profiles_List
actions.description: Lists all of the CDN profiles within an Azure subscription.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: Profiles_ListByResourceGroup
actions.description: Lists all of the CDN profiles within a resource group.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: Profiles_Delete
actions.description: Deletes an existing CDN profile with the specified parameters. Deleting a profile will result in the deletion of all of the sub-resources including endpoints, origins and custom domains.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: Profiles_Get
actions.description: Gets a CDN profile with the specified profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: Profiles_Update
actions.description: Updates an existing CDN profile with the specified profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.title: Profiles_Create
actions.description: Creates a new CDN profile with a profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

actions.title: Profiles_ListResourceUsage
actions.description: Checks the quota and actual usage of endpoints under the given CDN profile.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

actions.title: Endpoints_ListByProfile
actions.description: Lists existing CDN endpoints.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

actions.title: Endpoints_Delete
actions.description: Deletes an existing CDN endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

endpointName.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

actions.description: Gets an existing CDN endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

endpointName.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

actions.title: Endpoints_Update
actions.description: Updates an existing CDN endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile. Only tags and Origin HostHeader can be updated after creating an endpoint. To update origins, use the Update Origin operation. To update custom domains, use the Update Custom Domain operation.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

endpointName.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.

actions.description: Creates a new CDN endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

actions.title: Endpoints_ValidateCustomDomain
actions.description: Validates the custom domain mapping to ensure it maps to the correct CDN endpoint in DNS.

actions.title: Profiles_GenerateSsoUri
actions.description: Generates a dynamic SSO URI used to sign in to the CDN supplemental portal. Supplemnetal portal is used to configure advanced feature capabilities that are not yet available in the Azure portal, such as core reports in a standard profile; rules engine, advanced HTTP reports, and real-time stats and alerts in a premium profile. The SSO URI changes approximately every 10 minutes.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profileName.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

api-version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2016-10-02.
